      • saveText

        public void saveText(java.lang.String conversation,
            boolean appendToEnd,
            java.util.ArrayList<QueryInfo> timeInfo)
        This method will save text into a text file.
        Parameters:
        conversation - This is the actual information that is presented on the screen in the application.
        appendToEnd - This will make sure that all the data will get appended to the end of the file.
        timeInfo - This is the timeing info for the database, and how long it took to do each query.
